headline: Bitcoin, Ethereum, XRP, Dogecoin Flat As Iran Tensions Rise: Analyst Identifies 'Resistance To Clear' For A BTC 'Breakout'
summary: Leading cryptocurrencies moved sideways on Thursday, while commodities gained as President Donald Trump weighed a military attack on Iran.

headline: Coinbase Super Bowl Payout Complaints Test Trust And Valuation Story
summary: Coinbase Global (NasdaqGS:COIN) is facing user complaints about delayed or missing payouts from its Super Bowl "Big Game Challenge" promotion. Participants report that expected rewards have not arrived, raising questions about customer support and payout processing on the platform. The issue has drawn attention from users who see promotional reliability as part of the overall Coinbase experience. Coinbase runs a large crypto trading and custody platform, so user trust in basic account...

summary: Coinbase’s fourth quarter results were marked by a decline in revenue and profitability compared to the prior year, falling short of Wall Street’s expectations.
